Posts.Content: Dec 10, 2012 07:17PM Michelles66 wrote: My hair seems to be doing ok, no loss there....yet, but hair everywhere else doesn't seem to want to grow.  Very little eyebrows & eyelashes keep falling out, I hardly have any on the bottom.  Also I shave about once every couple weeks, which isn't a bad thing!  My breast navigator who also had BC said when her hair grew back it was very thin & didn't grow that well.  I'm just glad to get rid of the scarves, so anything on my head is a blessing!
Posts.Title: Taxotere - hair loss AFTER re-growth? Evvie Shannie

Posts.Content: Dec 10, 2012 06:45PM Michelles66 wrote: I have been feeling same type of thing.  Last chemo treatment was 2/12 & around end of August I started getting weakness in arm & pins & needles in right foot & numbness & tingling in hands.  Sharp pain in arm & horrible pain, so bad I have a hard time sleeping at night.  When I went for my last ONC check up she just told me to use aspercreme & motrin.  But since that visit it has gotten worse, not sure what to do now.  Yours sounds like what my did in the beginning.  Was wondering if this was normal after chemo & does it go away?????
Posts.Title: Neuropathy After Chemo??? mbf BilateralBeauties
